info.name: Declutter Series - Gmail
info.description: Removes adverts and useless buttons. Faithful in style to unmodified Gmail, compatible with most other themes, including all Google-provided themes. Part of the Declutter Series.
info.additionalInfo:
Suitable for those using Gmail for email only. Items removed:
  • Adverts
  • Google+ features (re-removed after update)
  • Links to other Google apps
  • Auto-categories
